text: yoosuf ne kahaah tumhaare paas tumhaara vah bhojan nahin aayega, jo tum donon ko diya jaata hai, parantu main tum donon ko usaka arth (phal) bata doonga; ye un baaton mein se hai, jo mere paalanahaar ne mujhe sikhaayee hain. mainne us jaati ka dharm taj diya hai, jo allaah par eemaan nahin rakhatee aur vahee paralok ko nakaarane vaale hain
